titles.title: Each Day's A New Day, A New Day In The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Each day's a new day, a new day in the Lord;
Each day's a new day to offer up His praises,
Forgetting those things which are behind
And looking unto those things before us,
Each day's a new day, a new day in the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I don't have to be the same
Today as I was yesterday,
And I don't have to be the same tomorrow;
Each day, each hour, each moment,
I'm new in Him,
Praise God He's changing me,
Every moment I'm new in Him.
